divs: Sighting DetailsI had to separate incidents that couldnt be from this world it was shaped like a football about 6 to 10 ft long and it flew right passed me im a boilermaker and I was on the roof of the power plant it was pickaway power station I was talking to a fellow boilermaker so he saw it to if you want to call me thats ok it really freaked me out I now know we are not alone
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Columbus
There were no other sightings in Columbus on or around July 15th 2011
Summary: Glowing football about 6 to 10 ft long
